document.full_text: new evidence emerged on friday that women taking bayer's best-selling contraceptive yasmin may run a higher risk of dangerous blood clots than those using older birth-control pills.
document.title: new studies point to clot risk of bayer's yasmin
lines_and_colors: new evidence emerged on friday that women taking bayer's best-selling contraceptive yasmin may run a higher risk of dangerous blood clots than those using older birth-control pills.
